description: romeo and juliet meet at capulet party and fall in love
romeo and juliet declare love and plan to marry
friar lawrence marries romeo and juliet in secret
tybalt and mercutio fight resulting in mercutio's death
romeo kills tybalt in revenge for mercutio's death
prince escalus banishes romeo from verona
juliet drinks friar's potion to fake her death
romeo and juliet both die in capulet tomb
